Today 26 Aug Wimmera

Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower near the Grampians, near zero chance elsewhere. Winds westerly 20 to 30 km/h turning northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late evening.

Tue 27 Aug Wimmera

Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower in the south in the evening, dry elsewhere. Damaging winds possible about the Grampians. Winds north to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h increasing to 35 to 50 km/h in the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between 6 and 9 with daytime temperatures reaching the low 20s.

Wed 28 Aug Wimmera

Cloudy. High chance of showers near the Grampians, slight chance elsewhere. Winds northwesterly 30 to 40 km/h turning westerly 35 to 55 km/h before dawn then decreasing to 30 to 45 km/h in the late afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to around 10 with daytime temperatures reaching around 16.

Thu 29 Aug Wimmera

Cloudy. Medium chance of showers in the south, slight chance elsewhere. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending north to northwesterly 20 to 30 km/h during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to around 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 19.

Fri 30 Aug Wimmera

Partly cloudy. High chance of showers, most likely in the morning. Winds north to northwesterly 25 to 35 km/h turning westerly 30 to 45 km/h during the morning then tending west to northwesterly 20 to 25 km/h during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 11 with daytime temperatures reaching between 17 and 21.
